thread.section_title: Fastport Passport Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fastport Passport | fastportpassport.com
thread.title: Maurine Ford
thread.title_full: Fastport Passport reviewed by Maurine Ford

author: Maurine Ford
title: Maurine Ford
text: I was expecting to receive my passport on Monday, however, it did not show. When I contacted Fastport Passport, they said it would arrive the next day. Unfortunately, it did not and it was after hours when I realized it hadn't arrived. I emailed and phoned Dominique and she was awesome. She responded immediately to my email and reassured me I would have it this morning. Along with this she sent the Fed Ex tracking information. And thankfully, it arrived this morning in time for my trip. I was fearful yesterday until Dominique responded after hours and let me know everything was okay.
